activities:
Novus Law, LLC receives personal information of clients, and/or customers of clients, residing in EU countries in its capacity and role as a legal support services provider.  Novus Law processes and analyzes personal data for the limited purposes of providing document review, management and analysis for lawyers, in accordance with the instructions of its clients.  
Employees and authorized personnel of Novus Law are given access to personal information only on a need-to-know basis and do not disclose any individual’s personal information to third parties.  Novus Law may share information with a subsidiary or affiliate entity in connection with rendering of client services, but under strict confidentiality and secure circumstances, and only with client’s knowledge and permission.
